name: Help the helpless
description:
Help the helpless is about helping a red guy with you ability to fly. 

A puzzle game made for GMTK 2021.

In order to get to the next level, you have to reach the door with both of the characters. The more times you complete the game the faster your characters will become.

You control the blue guy with WASD and the red one with the arrows.

The pixel art is made my Blackspire :

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/medieval-pixel-art-asset-f...
